019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonArray;
022import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
023import freemarker.core.ParseException;
024import freemarker.template.Configuration;
025import freemarker.template.DefaultObjectWrapperBuilder;
026import freemarker.template.MalformedTemplateNameException;
027import freemarker.template.TemplateException;
028import freemarker.template.TemplateExceptionHandler;
029import freemarker.template.TemplateHashModel;
030import freemarker.template.TemplateMethodModelEx;
031import freemarker.template.TemplateModelException;
032import freemarker.template.TemplateNotFoundException;
033import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
034import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesApi;
035import java.io.IOException;
036import java.net.URI;
037import java.net.URISyntaxException;
038import java.util.HashMap;
039import java.util.List;
040import java.util.Map;
041import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.VM_OP_GROUP;
042import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.VmDefChanged.Type;
043import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.ExtendedObjectWrapper;
044import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.ParseUtils;
045import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
046import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
047import org.jgrapes.core.Components;
048import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
049import org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate;
050
051/**
052 * Adapts Kubenetes resources to changes in VM definitions (CRs). 
053 */
054@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis",
055    "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
056public class Reconciler extends Component {
057
058    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SingularField")
059    private final Configuration fmConfig;
060    private final CmReconciler cmReconciler;
061    private final StsReconciler stsReconciler;
062    private final ServiceReconciler serviceReconciler;
063    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
064    private final Map<String, Object> config = new HashMap<>();
065
066    /**
067     * Instantiates a new reconciler.
068     *
069     * @param componentChannel the component channel
070     */
071    public Reconciler(Channel componentChannel) {
072        super(componentChannel);
073
074        // Configure freemarker library
075        fmConfig = new Configuration(Configuration.VERSION_2_3_32);
076        fmConfig.setDefaultEncoding("utf-8");
077        fmConfig.setObjectWrapper(new ExtendedObjectWrapper(
078            fmConfig.getIncompatibleImprovements()));
079        fmConfig.setTemplateExceptionHandler(
080            TemplateExceptionHandler.RETHROW_HANDLER);
081        fmConfig.setLogTemplateExceptions(false);
082        fmConfig.setClassForTemplateLoading(Reconciler.class, "");
083
084        cmReconciler = new CmReconciler(fmConfig);
085        stsReconciler = new StsReconciler(fmConfig);
086        serviceReconciler = new ServiceReconciler(fmConfig);
087    }
088
089    /**
090     * Configure the component.
091     *
092     * @param event the event
093     */
094    @Handler
095    public void onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event) {
096        event.structured(Components.manager(parent()).componentPath())
097            .ifPresent(c -> {
098                if (c.containsKey("runnerData")) {
099                    config.put("runnerData", c.get("runnerData"));
100                }
101            });
102    }
103
104    /**
105     * Handles the change event.
106     *
107     * @param event the event
108     * @param channel the channel
109     * @throws ApiException the api exception
110     * @throws IOException 
111     * @throws ParseException 
112     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException 
113     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException 
114     * @throws TemplateException 
115     * @throws KubectlException 
116     */
117    @Handler
118    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ConfusingTernary")
119    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, VmChannel channel)
120            throws ApiException, TemplateException, IOException {
121        // Get complete VM (CR) definition
122        var apiVersion = K8s.version(event.object().getApiVersion());
123        DynamicKubernetesApi vmCrApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi(VM_OP_GROUP,
124            apiVersion, event.crd().getName(), channel.client());
125        var defMeta = event.object().getMetadata();
126
127        // Update the "buffered" definition, if it still exists.
128        if (event.type() != Type.DELETED) {
129            K8s.get(vmCrApi, defMeta).ifPresent(def -> channel
130                .setVmDefinition(patchCr(def.getRaw().deepCopy())));
131        }
132
133        // Reconcile
134        Map<String, Object> model = prepareModel(channel.vmDefinition());
135        if (event.type() != Type.DELETED) {
136            var configMap = cmReconciler.reconcile(event, model, channel);
137            model.put("cm", configMap.getRaw());
138            stsReconciler.reconcile(event, model, channel);
139            serviceReconciler.reconcile(event, model, channel);
140        } else {
141            serviceReconciler.reconcile(event, model, channel);
142            stsReconciler.reconcile(event, model, channel);
143            cmReconciler.reconcile(event, model, channel);
144        }
145    }
146
147    private Map<String, Object> prepareModel(JsonObject vmDef)
148            throws TemplateModelException {
149        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
150        Map<String, Object> model = new HashMap<>();
151        model.put("cr", vmDef);
152        model.put("constants",
153            (TemplateHashModel) new DefaultObjectWrapperBuilder(
154                Configuration.VERSION_2_3_32)
155                    .build().getStaticModels()
156                    .get(Constants.class.getName()));
157        model.put("config", config);
158
159        // Methods
160        model.put("parseMemory", new TemplateMethodModelEx() {
161            @Override
162            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.PreserveStackTrace")
163            public Object exec(@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") List arguments)
164                    throws TemplateModelException {
165                var arg = arguments.get(0);
166                if (arg instanceof Number number) {
167                    return number;
168                }
169                try {
170                    return ParseUtils.parseMemory(arg.toString());
171                } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
172                    throw new TemplateModelException("Cannot parse memory "
173                        + "specified as \"" + arg + "\": " + e.getMessage());
174                }
175            }
176        });
177        return model;
178    }
179
180    private JsonObject patchCr(JsonObject vmDef) {
181        // Adjust cdromImage path
182        var disks
183            = GsonPtr.to(vmDef).to("spec", "vm", "disks").get(JsonArray.class);
184        for (var disk : disks) {
185            var cdrom = (JsonObject) ((JsonObject) disk).get("cdrom");
186            if (cdrom == null) {
187                continue;
188            }
189            String image = cdrom.get("image").getAsString();
190            if (image.isEmpty()) {
191                continue;
192            }
193            try {
194                @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
195                var imageUri = new URI("file://" + Constants.IMAGE_REPO_PATH
196                    + "/").resolve(image);
197                if ("file".equals(imageUri.getScheme())) {
198                    cdrom.addProperty("image", imageUri.getPath());
199                } else {
200                    cdrom.addProperty("image", imageUri.toString());
201                }
202            } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
203                logger.warning(() -> "Invalid CDROM image: " + image);
204            }
205        }
206        return vmDef;
207    }
208
209}
